org.apache.flink.configuration

类 HistoryServerOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.configuration.HistoryServerOptions

  • @PublicEvolving
public class HistoryServerOptions
extends java.lang.Object
    The set of configuration options relating to the HistoryServer.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.String> HISTORY_SERVER_ARCHIVE_DIRS
      Comma-separated list of directories which the HistoryServer polls for new archives.
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.Long> HISTORY_SERVER_ARCHIVE_REFRESH_INTERVAL
      The interval at which the HistoryServer polls HISTORY_SERVER_ARCHIVE_DIRS for new archives.
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.String> HISTORY_SERVER_WEB_ADDRESS
      The address under which the HistoryServer web-frontend is accessible.
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.String> HISTORY_SERVER_WEB_DIR
      The local directory used by the HistoryServer web-frontend.
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.Integer> HISTORY_SERVER_WEB_PORT
      The port under which the HistoryServer web-frontend is accessible.
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.Long> HISTORY_SERVER_WEB_REFRESH_INTERVAL
      The refresh interval for the HistoryServer web-frontend in milliseconds.
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.Boolean> HISTORY_SERVER_WEB_SSL_ENABLED
      Enables/Disables SSL support for the HistoryServer web-frontend.

    • 构造器概要

      • HISTORY_SERVER_ARCHIVE_REFRESH_INTERVAL

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.Long> HISTORY_SERVER_ARCHIVE_REFRESH_INTERVAL
        The interval at which the HistoryServer polls HISTORY_SERVER_ARCHIVE_DIRS for new archives.

      • HISTORY_SERVER_ARCHIVE_DIRS

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.String> HISTORY_SERVER_ARCHIVE_DIRS
        Comma-separated list of directories which the HistoryServer polls for new archives.

      • HISTORY_SERVER_WEB_DIR

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.String> HISTORY_SERVER_WEB_DIR
        The local directory used by the HistoryServer web-frontend.

      • HISTORY_SERVER_WEB_ADDRESS

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.String> HISTORY_SERVER_WEB_ADDRESS
        The address under which the HistoryServer web-frontend is accessible.

      • HISTORY_SERVER_WEB_PORT

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.Integer> HISTORY_SERVER_WEB_PORT
        The port under which the HistoryServer web-frontend is accessible.

      • HISTORY_SERVER_WEB_REFRESH_INTERVAL

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.Long> HISTORY_SERVER_WEB_REFRESH_INTERVAL
        The refresh interval for the HistoryServer web-frontend in milliseconds.

      • HISTORY_SERVER_WEB_SSL_ENABLED

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.Boolean> HISTORY_SERVER_WEB_SSL_ENABLED
        Enables/Disables SSL support for the HistoryServer web-frontend. Only relevant if SecurityOptions.SSL_ENABLED is enabled.
